attributes.action: National legality for unrestricted access to park on ones driveway without being blocked in
attributes.additional_details:
The right to park in your driveway without some one to park over your driveway preventing access. There should be a penalty imposed for breaking the law. Especially if you can't park on your drive way when you get home, meaning that your car has to be parked on a public road. This causes issues I someone were to hit someone's car as the insurance company would invalidate your insurance and therefore you would be insured and breaking the law.

Therefore make it 100% clear that it is illegal to park in front of a driveway preventing access unless you own that driveway.
